name: rejs-example
body:
rejs-example
============

Code examples using rejs.
Test and buid code are using npm run-scripts.

How to use is as follows:

## Build with cli
```
$ npm run cli
$ npm test
```

## Build with grunt
```
$ npm run grunt
$ npm test
```

## Build with gulp
```
$ npm run gulp
$ npm test
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
